mapper.select: select bc.comment_no, b.board_no, b.board_title, mi.mem_nickname, bc.comment_date, bc.comment_content from board_comment bc inner join board_post b on bc.board_no = b.board_no inner join member_info mi on bc.mem_no = mi.mem_no where mi.mem_no = #{mem_no}
select b.board_no, b.board_title, m.mem_nickname,b.board_date,b.board_hit from board_post b inner join member_info m on b.mem_no = m.mem_no where m.mem_no = #{mem_no}
